parameter: Sea surface fluorescence, colored dissolved organic matter [ppb (QSE)] (SSfCDOM)

parameter: Chlorophyll a, areal concentration [mg/m**2] (Chl a conc)
description: at the sampling location and date
method: Calculated by vertical integration of fluorescence profiles 0-200 m or bottom

parameter: Sea surface quantum yield of fluorescence [%] (Ssphi sat)
description: at the sampling location for a period of 30 days around the sampling date, using satellite-based estimates of surface fluorescence and photosynthetically active radiation (Behrenfeld et al. 2009), and corr. for Non-Photochemical Quenching (NPQ)

parameter: Net primary production of carbon [mg/m**2/day] (NPP C)
description: at the sampling location and date
method: Calculated using the Arctic-adapted UQAR-TAKUVIK model (URI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.pocean.2015.08.008)
